name: Animosity (itch) (Karlton)
description:
Animosity is a simple auto-chess game involving animals brawling each other on a game board. 

Developed in unity from scratch in one week for the Slow Sloth Game Jam

Current Version: Alpha 0.014 (10/08/2022)

Animals in the game so far:

  -Vulture(legendary)

  -Bear(rare)

  -Shark(rare)

  -Eagle(common)

  -Wolf(common)

  -Lion(common)

UPDATES;

(10/08/2022) 0.013: added music and rarity probability

(10/08/2022) 0.0133: added more menu functionality and a "how to play"

(10/08/2022) 0.014: added more menu functionality and graphics
